title: Slumdog Millionaire ( Q & A)
description:
Q & A (aka Slumdog Millionaire)

Author: Vikas Swarup 

Country: India 

Language: English 

Genre: Novel 

Publication date: 2005

Pages: 381 pp 

ISBN: ISBN 0-7432-6747-8 

"Q & A is a novel by Vikas Swarup, an Indian diplomat. Published in 2005, it was the author's first novel. Set in India, it tells the story of Ram Mohammad Thomas, a poor young waiter who becomes the biggest quiz-show winner in history, only to be sent to jail on accusations (but with no evidence or proof) that he cheated. It was the basis of the 2008 Oscar-winning feature film Slumdog Millionaire. The novel was re-published under the title Slumdog Millionaire after the success of the film."
